text: Francesco Forleo (13 November 1941 â€“ 24 June 2018) was an Italian politician and policeman. He served as a Deputy from 1987 to 1994. He was born in Turin. Forleo died of dementia in Genoa on 24 June 2018 at the age of 76.Francesco Forleo, morto ex parlamentare e questore di Milano, Firenze e Brindisi == References == Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Turin Category:Police officers
